title: Three-Way hat is novel fashion [excerpt from Australian Diary No. 039]
other_title: Three Way Hat is Novel Fashion [excerpt from Australian Diary No. 039]
creator_contributor_role: Australian National Film Board, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Fashion
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Fashion - Australia
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Millinery
abstract: Young John Pickworth is an expert milliner. His three-in-one hat design is a design innovation.
description: Already having designed hats worn by the Hollywood set including actress Vivien Leigh and renowned gossip columnist of the day - Hedda Hopper - the Queen's own milliner also gives John some high praise. Here we see John's latest design, an innovative hat that can be worn in three different ways. [Source: NFSA Film Australia Collection]
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2003098; Aspects in Fashion; Active; 2015
